abilities.name: Crystal Type
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach a Water, Lightning, or Fighting basic Energy card from your hand to Kabutops, Kabutop's type (color) becomes the same as that type of energy until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Draining Cut
attacks.effect: Remove a damage counter from Kabutops.

attacks.name: Triple Cutter
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
